faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our services and processes.
faq.still_have_questions: Still have questions? We're here to help!

items.question: How long does it take to publish an app to Google Play?
items.answer: Typically 24-48 hours for the publishing process. Google Play review can take 1-3 days additional. We monitor the entire process and keep you updated.

items.question: Can I transfer the app to my own developer account later?
items.answer: Yes! We offer free transfer within 60 days. After 60 days, the app will be frozen to protect our account integrity. The transfer process is seamless and fully supported.

items.question: What happens if Google rejects my app?
items.answer: We provide full support to address any policy violations. While we can't guarantee approval (as this depends on Google), we help optimize your app to meet all requirements and resubmit if needed.

items.question: Do you support all web frameworks for DevOps deployment?
items.answer: Yes! We support Laravel, Django, Node.js, React, Vue.js, Angular, Next.js, Flutter Web, and most other popular frameworks. If you have a specific requirement, just ask!

items.question: Is SSL certificate really free for life?
items.answer: Absolutely! We use Let's Encrypt certificates which are free and automatically renewed. Your site will always have HTTPS security without any additional cost.

items.question: How does the CI/CD auto-deployment work?
items.answer: We set up GitHub Actions or GitLab CI that automatically deploys your code when you push to your main branch. Every git push triggers a deployment to your live server.

items.question: Can you host Telegram bots 24/7?
items.answer: Yes! Our bot hosting service ensures 24/7 availability with automatic restart on failure, monitoring, and alerts. Supports both Python and Node.js bots.

items.question: What if I need custom modifications after deployment?
items.answer: We provide full documentation and video tutorials so you can manage your deployment. For additional modifications, we offer ongoing support at competitive rates.

items.question: Do you provide refunds if I'm not satisfied?
items.answer: We stand behind our work. If we cannot deliver the promised service due to technical limitations on our end, we provide a full refund. Client satisfaction is our priority.

items.question: How do I get started?
items.answer: Simply contact us on Telegram @yourusername with your project details. We'll discuss your requirements and provide a custom quote based on your needs.

contact.title: Ready to Launch?
contact.subtitle: Get in touch today and let's discuss how we can help launch your digital products with speed and professionalism.
contact.response_description: We typically respond within 2-4 hours during business hours (9 AM - 6 PM UTC+5). For urgent requests, contact us via Telegram for the fastest response.
contact.telegram_cta: Or reach out directly via Telegram for instant communication
